verses.verse: My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3700>longs,<s%> and even <S%H3615>faints<s%> for the <S%H2691>courts<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> My <S%H3820>heart<s%> and my <S%H1320>flesh<s%> cry <S%H7442>out<s%> for the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H410>God.<s%>

<S%H6833>Yes,<s%> the sparrow has <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H1004>home,<s%> and the <S%H1866>swallow<s%> a <S%H7064>nest<s%> for <S%H7896>herself,<s%> where she may have her <S%H667>young,<s%> near your <S%H4196>altars,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> my <S%H4428>King,<s%> and my <S%H430>God.<s%>
<S%H835>Blessed<s%> are those who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in your <S%H1004>house.<s%> They are always <S%H1984>praising<s%> <S%H5542>you.<s%> Selah.
<S%H835>Blessed<s%> are <S%H120>those<s%> whose <S%H5797>strength<s%> is in <S%H3824>you;<s%> who have set their hearts on a <S%H4546>pilgrimage.<s%>

<S%H5674>Passing<s%> through the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H1056>Weeping,<s%> they <S%H7896>make<s%> it a place of <S%H4599>springs.<s%> <S%H4175>Yes,<s%> the autumn rain <S%H5844>covers<s%> it with <S%H1293>blessings.<s%>
They <S%H3212>go<s%> from <S%H2428>strength<s%> to <S%H2428>strength.<s%> Everyone of them <S%H7200>appears<s%> before <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>

For a <S%H3117>day<s%> in your <S%H2691>courts<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than a <S%H505>thousand.<s%> I would <S%H977>rather<s%> be a <S%H5605>doorkeeper<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H430>God,<s%> than to <S%H1752>dwell<s%> in the <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H7562>wickedness.<s%>

For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> is a <S%H8121>sun<s%> and a <S%H4043>shield.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> and <S%H3519>glory.<s%> He <S%H4513>withholds<s%> no <S%H2896>good<s%> thing from those who <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H8549>blamelessly.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> <S%H835>blessed<s%> is the <S%H120>man<s%> who trusts in <S%H982>you.<s%>
